description: The new roles will be in Dublin and Cork and brings Amazon's total Irish workforce to 5,000.
title: Amazon to create a further 1,000 jobs in Ireland
title_page: Amazon to create a further 1,000 jobs in Ireland - BBC News
maintext: The company said the wind farm will also help it meet its commitment to power its global operations with 100% renewable energy by 2025 as part of its goal to reach net zero carbon by 2040.
